summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeMurad's Cellular Hydration Barrier Repair Cream is a daily nourishing cream with fatty acids from bilberry omegas that immediately repairs dry, flaky skin at the cellular level.
details: DetailsBenefitsImmediately repairs dry, flaky skin*Immediately restores skin's bounce and radiance*Immediately nourishes and locks in barrier hydration for 24 hours at the cellular level**Based on a 4-week clinical study with 48 subjects, ranging in Fitzpatrick Types 1-6Key IngredientsRefined bilberry seed oil (from handpicked berries): Provides the essential fatty acids for healthy barriers: omegas 3 and 6Premium allantoin (elevated with an oat-like molecule): Retains skin moisture, while deeply soothingFast-acting compound: that mimics calming botanicals: Increases the tolerance of highly reactive skinFormulated without: Parabens, sulfates, phthalates, gluten, animal-derived ingredients, mineral oil, formaldehyde, oxybenzone,Â petrolatum, alcohol (ethanol)FeaturesSolution for:Compromised skin barrierHighly reactive skinDry skinFlaky skinDehydrated skinRednessSkin-cycling (recovery phase)Item 2617753How To UseTo Use: AM and PMStep 1Massage a gentle cleanser or your favorite Murad cleanser over dampened face and neck. Rinse and pat dry.Step 2Apply an even layer of Cellular Hydration Barrier Repair Serum onto clean skin. Massage Cellular Hydration Barrier Repair Cream evenly over face and neck. Follow with a sunscreen during the day.Step 3On nights when skin needs added soothing and hydration, massage Cellular Hydration Barrier Repair Mask over the serum in place of your cream. Do not rinse until morning.IngredientsWater/Aqua/Eau, Squalane, Glycerin, Cocoglycerides, Pentylene Glycol, Hydrogenated Rapeseed Oil, Vaccinium Myrtillus Seed Oil, Isopentyldiol, C10-18 Triglycerides, Niacinamide, Candelilla/Jojoba/Rice Bran Polyglyceryl-3 Esters, Polyglyceryl-10 Distearate, 4-t-Butylcyclohexanol, Potassium Cetyl Phosphate, Allantoin, Galactoarabinan, Bisabolol, Cetylhydroxyproline Palmitamide, Brassica Campestris (Rapeseed) Sterols, Hydroxyphenyl Propamidobenzoic Acid, Urea, Yeast Amino Acids, Trehalose, Inositol, Taurine, Betaine, Hydroxyacetophenone, Tocopherol, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Hexyldecanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Butylene Glycol, Glyceryl Stearate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Sodium Polyacrylate, Sodium Polyacryloyldimethyl Taurate, Sodium Stearoyl Lactylate, Xanthan Gum, Stearic Acid, Xylitol, Caprylic Acid, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Citric Acid, Chlorphenesin, Dehydroacetic Acid, Caprylyl Glycol, Limonene, Linalool, Fragrance (Parfum).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: To Use: AM and PMStep 1Massage a gentle cleanser or your favorite Murad cleanser over dampened face and neck. Rinse and pat dry.Step 2Apply an even layer of Cellular Hydration Barrier Repair Serum onto clean skin. Massage Cellular Hydration Barrier Repair Cream evenly over face and neck. Follow with a sunscreen during the day.Step 3On nights when skin needs added soothing and hydration, massage Cellular Hydration Barrier Repair Mask over the serum in place of your cream. Do not rinse until morning.

reviews.headline: Only used a few times but already in love!
reviews.comments: I have rosacea, very sensitive skin, reactive skin and dry skin. This feels so good going on! I hope it lasts a while for this price. Its pricey but if it lasts at least a couple months then its gonna be worth it!

reviews.headline: Not for me
reviews.comments: I think I'm just having skin issues, this isn't a bad product but still isn't hydrating enough (for me) but it didn't cause breakouts so I will continue to use it.

reviews.headline: So good!
reviews.comments: I received this cream complimentary from Murad! I paired it with their whole lineup of skincare and my face hasn't ever been better! I don't know what they put in their products but it's magnificent!!!

reviews.headline: Great Moisturizer!
reviews.comments: I received this product complimentary from Murad in exchange for my review. As someone who hasn't had a great history with murad products I was a little hesitant to try it but after using it for a while I can say without doubt that I am head over heals for this moisturizer. It leaves my skin super soft and hydrated without feeling greasy

reviews.headline: So Great!
reviews.comments: This was gifted to me by Murad in exchange for a review. I like how this is easy to apply on and I've been using it continuously and I like how it's been working so far. I have sensitive skin & it doesn't bother me either.

reviews.headline: This one is a game changer for dry skin
reviews.comments: I received this product complimentary from Murad Beauty. I have been testing this moisturizer for more than 2 weeks and I am ready to share my thoughts about it. The Cellular Hydration Barrier Repair Cream comes in an innovative packaging and you can dose/pump the right amount of product you need. It has a pleasant herbal smell and it's wasy to work on your skin. Now, in the winter season it's been saving my skin every single day. It's so moisturizing, so hydrating and feels so good on. I use this one at nighttime in combination with the serum from the same range. I used to wake up with very dry skin every morning, not anymore.

reviews.headline: Acne friendly
reviews.comments: This cream is sucha good nourishing moisturizer, pairing it up with the cellular serum is a solid two step morning routine. I have ongoing acne and this pair has helped calm my and soothe my skin along with keeping my skin barrier in check. Gifted by murad.

reviews.headline: Top tier moisturizer!
reviews.comments: New favorite moisturizer! It is VERY rich and I suggest you use sparingly if you have super oily skin, use plenty if you have dry combo skin especially in the winter. I love the consistency and am impressed with how hydrated and plump my skin looks and feels after use! Offered by Murad

reviews.headline: Perfect for dry skin
reviews.comments: I deal with super over drying skin! Especially in the winter time! Using this cream has given me such hydration, locking in all day! The pump dispenser gives you about the correct amount to apply! Gifted by murad.

reviews.headline: Great purchase
reviews.comments: I received murad cellular hydration repair serum for gifted by murad and let me tell you I was not disappointed at all. This definitely hydrated my combination skin and there are not many products that can do that!

reviews.headline: Very hydrating!
reviews.comments: This amazing cream was gifted by Murad! I'm in love with the packaging especially the press down and dispense feature! This cream does wonders for my skin when it gets dry and it's not too heavy and it doesn't make my face oily which is always great!

reviews.headline: A must have!
reviews.comments: What a great moisturizer! I am SUPER picky with moisturizers. This one is the perfect consistency! It's thick, not sticky, and really moisturizes the skin. I love this at night for a thick layer of hydration through the night. I wake up with super soft skin and i couldn't be happier! Gifted by Murad

reviews.headline: Great hydration during winter
reviews.comments: I've been using this cream in my skin cycling routine for my 2 healing days post exfoliation and retinol. When I tell you my skin is JUICY, PLUMP and HYDRATED in this cold winter air, it really is it's a thick moisturizer so you don't need a lot. Gifted by murad

reviews.headline: Repair your skin
reviews.comments: The cellular hydration barier repair cream has been like a cup of water to my parched skin. My skin feels extra dry in the winter time and has been peeling more than often because of retinol but once I apply this cream, my skin feels and looks noticeably hydrated. I use this after the barrier repair serum. Gifted by Murad.

reviews.headline: Full Hydration
reviews.comments: This is an ultra rich cream that is perfect for my PM routine.  I apply it and instantly I feel that my skin is soaking it all in and getting hydrated.  In the AM, I feel my skin is soft and plump and has been nurtured all night.  Complimentary from Murad.

reviews.headline: Broke me out but not my husband
reviews.comments: Unfortunately I did not enjoy this. It left a little bit of a greasy feeling on my skin and the scent is really strong to me. I also ended up breaking out so I gave it to my husband to use and he likes it so it depends on your skin. Gifted by murad

reviews.headline: Hello hydration
reviews.comments: I received this product complimentary from Murad! Wow I have used this for 3 weeks and I have to say, it is CHEFS KISS. My skin is incredibly dry from the winter. I'm talking eyelids and neck and this cream has done an AMAZING job with hydration. My skin feels very hydrated. Additionally as someone with extremely sensitive acne prone skin, I didn't not have any issues!

reviews.headline: It's a yes for me!
reviews.comments: I love how rich this cream is, it's on a thicker side and a little goes a long way. I makes a great difference in my skin especially the redness. It helps to keep my skin feeling hydrated and ever since I started using it I haven't experienced any flakiness. Received complimentary from Murad.

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: My skin tends to get dry and after trying this cream my skin has been improving. It has been soothing, repairing and moisturizing my dry skin and keeps it hydrated. It  absorbs in nicely and I just need a little bit it goes a long way.

reviews.headline: Would Buy Again
reviews.comments: I like that it has a good texture and is thick for my dry skin. It definitely kept me hydrated and moisturized all night and is good for winter. The packaging is pretty too. It might be a little too much for more oily skin. *offered by Murad

media.headline: A new staple in my routine
A Must Add to skin care routine
A must add to skin routine
I am super impressed so far!

faceoff_positive.comments: I received the Murad Cellular Hydration Barrier Cream free from Influenster in exchange for my honest review. That's exactly what I'm gonna give you as I'm obsessed.  This is my first time ever trying Murad products, and I'm so thankful I was chosen for this product because I have oily/combination skin and its hard to find products that don't make my face look greasy or feel like I'm weighed down. This cream is super moisturizing & has 24 hr Hydration.  It comes in a beautiful purple glass bottle with the pump on top.  It's easy to hold and use. A little product goes a long way. It's lightweight & absorbs amazing into my skin. My face feels like baby skin. I noticed after my first use I didn't have the dry & flaky patches between my eyes, eyebrows, and the edges of my hair line all the way around my face.  It's crazy that I noticed a difference all the way around from Hydration to my skins bounce. Believe me when I say I have a really hard time finding anything that works with my skin type. I have larger pores and immediately after washing my face I have oily skin severely on the side of my forehead at my temple area. It drives me crazy that I'm always so embarrassed because I can never get rid of it until this past week when I started to use a cleansing oil and this Murad Cellular Hydration Repair Cream. Now that I've had the chance to try a product from Murad, I'm excited to try other products from this brand. This is also good for all skin types which is hard to come by sometimes, especially because if you buy a product that just focuses on one skin type there's a possibility that you can have other areas you want to target and that product may not work. I would ABSOLUTELY 100% recommend this to everyone. I wanted to put in the title what kind of skin I have so that way if someone else has the same type of skin they'll know this will work for you and not make you look/feel oily or heavy. I know alot of times I'm very hesitant about buying new products because alot of people don't get into what type of skin they have and that's the first thing I look for when I'm purchasing a product is the reviews to see what others have experienced with their skin type. So Please don't hesitate or think twice about purchasing this product for all skin types. I promise you will be forever grateful and most likely find your new favorite product/company. Also, if anyone has any recommendations of any other Murad products that they've tried on oily/combination skin and its worked for you please let me know so I can have other products to go with my Cream. One last thing...ENJOY! You and your skin will Thank me & Murad. A++ company.
faceoff_positive.headline: Amazing for oily/combination skin.

faceoff_negative.comments: I wanted to love this product but unfortunately I can't say that I did. It very moisturizing but it was too heavy and ended up clogging my pores. I received the cellular Hydration Barrier Repair cream gifted by Murad, I've been so excited about this brand for so long I couldn't wait to try it. I loved the luxurious packaging and consistency of the cream but it didn't workout for me. Now, I will say I do have very sensitive skin so I don't step out of my skincare comfort zone often. I typically do fine with luxury skincare products though. I'm kind of sad it didn't workout for me but I'm going to give it to my daughter and see how it works for her. Even with this experience it won't be the last time I try this Brand.
faceoff_negative.headline: I would not buy this product again
